nodes.text: Tashtor Seneca was an astronomical object located in the Tashtor Seneca system, a part of the Mid Rim's Tashtor sector. It was connected to the Chalcedon system and the Petabys Station by the hyperlane known as the Great Gran Run. During the Galactic Civil War, the forces of the Galactic Empire destroyed the Croc of Gold, the freighter of the Rebel Alliance operative Devon Fuller, over Tashtor Seneca.

Tashtor Seneca was first mentioned in Galaxy Guide 9: Fragments from the Rim, a 1993 sourcebook written by Simon Smith and Eric S. Trautmann for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Tashtor Seneca system, and therefore Tashtor Seneca itself, in grid square J-16.
